comment: We had weekly quizzes with unlimited attempts, a few discussion posts, five movement activities where we recorded ourselves dancing, and two mandatory dance concerts with writing assignments. It wasn't a hard class, she just takes a while to grade discussion posts and writing assignments.

Not involved. Teaching this class is not her priority obviously. It took over 3 months to receive grades on discussion posts, and very little feedback (if any). The entire course was based on her personal opinion about culture. No extra credit offered, all quizzes take specific questions from the videos embedded in the online "blog" lectures.
